review:
Had a Zoom call with Dr Suma Raju.
She recommended a blood/ urine test and advised meds that helped with the symptoms.
I’ll definitely go back to her in future and also share her details to my friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: She was patient and very friendly. Also was very thorough with the questions and answers for the problem.

I took my mother to Dr. Suma Raju at Narayana Multispecialty Hospital, HSR Layout for a routine check-up.  What impressed me was the way Dr. Suma spoke with my mother.  Even though it was our first visit, she spoke with us like we were family.  When we asked about my mother’s creatinine levels, Dr. Suma managed to ease off my mother’s worries instantly.   Dr. Suma is much more than a competent Doctor. She is a fine human being, compassionate, and really concerned about her patients.  She is extremely patient and gives her advice calmly.  She explains everything clearly and she does not hesitate to answer any number of questions.   Even if it is anything other than nephrology, she is willing to give general advice.  A meeting with Dr. Suma does not give you the feeling that you are at a hospital.  An excellent Doctor, I highly recommend Dr. Suma Raju.
She doesn't give time and does not explain things in detail. Ur money get wasted. She should guide atleast .
reply_text: Madam, due to your poor network seems like you did not understand whatever was explained and also please go through the prescription wherein I have mentioned whom to consult.There is complete audio recording of our conversation which you can go through.There is also an option for chat in case if you have doubts.

review: Consulted for treatment of my 93 years old mother suffering from kidney related problems. The Doctor is expert in her field. Provides suffecient time to the patient *** ******** **** ******** ******** ** ********* ********* Highly recommended.
Doctor was friendly, heard the patient with attention and explained the possible problem efficiently. Hospital staffs were helpful too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is good human being. Listen all problem carefully.She gives good information . She has good knowledge.
The doctor was very patient to listen to all issues and explained the potential reasons for lab abnormalities. She sounds very reassuring and I'd definitely recommend her for consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doc listens to all problems patiently n so far  methodical in treatment. Making positive progress under treatment. Very good accessibility n less waiting period with proper appointment.

Doctor is accessible and easy to talk to. Does not instantly plunge into lot of diagnostic tests rather goes for preliminary tests and accepts tests done by other diagnostic centres which is rather good. She does not seem to come across as too open to alternative means of treatment. Has a cheerful exposition and states her point of view clearly.
